```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## SETUP
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

## PARAMS
```{r}
uber_raw_data_april14_url <- "https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/uber-tlc-foil-response/raw/master/uber-trip-data/uber-raw-data-apr14.csv"
```

## LOAD DATA
```{r}
uber_trip_data <- read_csv(file = uber_raw_data_april14_url, progress = TRUE)
```

## Plot Data
```{r}
uber_trip_data %>% 
  #head(10000) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Lon", "Lat"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 102003) %>% 
  st_coordinates() %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(X, Y), size = .0000001, color = "#83a48b") +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(1800000, 1850000), ylim = c(560000, 590000)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black"))
```
